title: Real-time interactive sessions
points: English Nudi offers live classes with experienced teachers who are native English speakers.
These classes are designed to help you improve your spoken English skills through interactive sessions where you can practice your speaking and listening skills with your trainer in real-time.

title: Brainstorming Competitions
points: Their dedicated team provides a space for you to engage in discussions on a variety of topics.
These discussions are designed to help you practice speaking fluently and confidently while also learning new vocabulary and expressions.

title: Team-building Activities
points: Our comprehensive course offers a variety of role-play activities that simulate common situations that you may encounter in your personal or professional life, such as job interviews, presentations, and social interactions.
These activities are designed to help you develop your communication skills and to build your confidence when speaking in English.
